PerfectNetExp.abs: 在抵达科尔基斯( Colchis)后，米特里达梯六世绕道黑海东北岸前往博斯普鲁斯王国 (Bosporan Kingdom)，那里由他的长子曼卡雷斯 (M…
因为科尔喀斯(Colchis)在古代以铸造术著称，加上埃厄特斯(Aietes)是位强大的巫师，所以把他设定为狂战衣的制造者。因其名有「力 …
左上角的科尔奇斯(Colchis)，当时属于罗马帝国领土。在此后的两千年中，此地一直是南俄各游牧民族-俄罗斯、罗马-东罗-奥斯曼、 …
在金羊毛的故事中的那条守护龙，就是受著科尔喀斯国（Colchis）国王埃厄忒斯（Aeetes）的命令，守护挂在神圣森林大树上的金羊 …

means.word_mean: 1. (Greek mythology) a region on the Black Sea south of the Caucasus that was the site of an ancient country where (according to Greek mythology) Jason sought the Golden Fleece

auth_sentence.content: Colchis is the ancient name for the Black Sea coast that is now western Georgia.
auth_sentence.res_content: Colchis is the ancient name for the Black Sea coast that is now western Georgia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Colchis is the ancient name for the Black Sea coast that is now western Georgia.
